DOC.brief_title: Danish Quality Assurance Project Diagnosis Treatment Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Outpatient Lung Clinics
DOC.criteria: Outpatient diagnosis referral diagnosis COPD . COPD must primary reason outpatient contact ( new patient control ) . Any comorbidity hamper diagnosis treatment COPD accordance COPD guideline use locally ( e.g . malignant disease , dementia sequela apoplexy ) . Asthma without presence COPD
